definition: to work/to handle matters/to have a job

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
daring to act and courageous enough to take responsibility for it (idiom)/a true man has the courage to accept the consequences of his actions/the buck stops here
pinyin: hao3 han4 zuo4 shi4 hao3 han4 dang1

sentences.english: We should have our only methods when doing things, and shouldn't imitate others mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 我们做事得有自己的方法，不能邯郸学步。

sentences.english: Do a post-analysis of all your buys and sells.
sentences.chinese: 对你所有的买卖做事后分析。

sentences.english: I do everything by habit one.
My parents speak and act like "old children", often make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 我父母的说话做事像个“老顽童”，常让人忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: For the first 2-hour block, just do what you'd normally do during that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在头一个两小时的时段里，你按部就班地做事就可以。

sentences.english: A typical quick temper, and work is rash, almost not pass through the brain.
sentences.chinese: 一个典型的急性子，做事也很鲁莽，几乎不经过大脑。
你是个做事主动的人吗？

sentences.english: Albert enjoys privacy and he tends to do things on the sly.
sentences.chinese: 亚伯特注重隐私，做事总是很神秘。

sentences.english: He is very methodical in His work, doing everything by rule.
sentences.chinese: 他做事有条不紊，每件事情都是按规则做的。

sentences.english: The man had a keen sense of justice and fair play.
sentences.chinese: 此人具有强烈的正义感，做事光明磊落。

sentences.english: Are you willing to stop procrastinating and start doing?
sentences.chinese: 你想要不再耽搁时间并开始做事吗？

sentences.english: What ate ther doing at these places?
sentences.chinese: 这些小朋友在帮他们的妈妈做事。

sentences.english: And how will big data change what you do?
sentences.chinese: 大数据将如何改变您的做事方式？

sentences.english: I’ll go and sleep some more, he said; thereis nothing else to do.
sentences.chinese: 我要再去睡会儿，也没有别的好做事了。

sentences.english: Have a to-do list that’s only three items long each day.
sentences.chinese: 每天，自己列出一个做事清单，只需三件事即可。

sentences.english: Pursuit made excellence, aspiration achieved eminence, unpretentious soared practicality, responsible humbled integrity.
sentences.chinese: 追求卓越，志存高远，踏实做事，诚信为人。

definition: to conduct oneself/to behave with integrity
to act impetuously (idiom); on an impulse
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
to plan matters/to look for a job
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
